shortdesc.p: This guide will give you helpful instructions and tips to make a delicious breakfast to start your day!
Want to Know more about each meal?
Frappes are a refreshing drink to have in the morning. The base of a frappe is ice-cold coffee, which would be perfect for a warm day when a hot coffee is just not right.
Orange juice is the perfect way to start your day, it's both refreshing and healthy.
Sandwiches aren't just meant for lunch anymore!
An omelet is a breakfast that is made by creating a thin layer of egg, then filling it with the filling of your choice.
Waffles have strtaed to make their comeback to the Breakfast food scene. This take on waffles will have your tastebuds singing!
This meal works for breakfast, lunch, dinner and everything in between!
Thirsty? These drinks will quench your thirst!

topic.title: How to Make a Caramel Frappe

shortdesc.p: Ever had a homemade frappe? This recipe can be made at home and this delightful drink will certainly wake you up!

topic.title: How to Make Fresh-Squeezed Orange Juice

shortdesc.p: Looking for something a but stronger to wake you up on the morning? This delicious Mimosa will certainly do the trick!
Feeling hungry? These meal recipes will satisfy your every craving!

topic.title: How to Make a Breakfast Sandwich

shortdesc.p: A breakfast sandwich is both easy to make and filling.
Omelets are delicious! Using this recipe you can create something to make for both your friends and family!
Waffles are an excellent way to start your day. These delicious waffles are hearty, healthy, and easy to make.

topic.title: How to Make a Breakfast Hash

shortdesc.p: Delicious and filling: the perfect combination!
Having Issues?
After you have made your tasty meal, be sure to clean up the kitchen utensils that you used for cooking.
It is imperative that you handle all kitchen appliances with care as to not injure yourself.
If you have any questions, here's how you can contact me!

shortdesc.p: Need help finding kitchen utensils and ingredients? Item locations are explained here.
Included are all the sources I used to create this breakfast guide.
